data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in F.A.T.A., N.W.F.P., Pakistan.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of F.A.T.A., N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of F.A.T.A. to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 43 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in F.A.T.A., N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of F.A.T.A. a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in F.A.T.A., N.W.F.P., Pakistan with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pindara people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord we pray you unite the 1,507 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in F.A.T.A..
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in F.A.T.A. who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help your children in F.A.T.A., N.W.F.P., Pakistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
